text: Maria Bethânia Viana Teles Velloso (born June 18, 1946 in Santo Amaro da Purificação, Bahia), known by her stage name Maria Bethânia, is a Brazilian singer-songwriter. Her brother is the singer Caetano Veloso. == Career == Her career began in 1965 after moving to Rio de Janeiro. She made her debut in the show Opinião. The same year she signed a contract with RCA Records and released her first album: Maria Bethãnia. In 1978 she was the first female singer in Brazil to have sold over a million CD's with her album: Álibi. In 47 years she has released over 50 albums. With over 26 millions in record sales she is one of most successful singers in Brazil. == References == == Other websites== * Official Website * Revista Veja - A nação das cantoras * All Music Guide profile Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian singers Category:Musicians from Rio de Janeiro
title: Maria Bethânia
